title: pax skins
body: how come we can not get any pax skins any more???

Isn't that the reason to give them to us? to stop the skins black market ripping people off, riot has said already they want to stop it
You guys are so fking thick it makes me wan to puke

> how come we can not get any pax skins any more???

Hey there jozza123,

PAX skins are limited time only skins and by that I mean they are code skins that are distributed at PAX events held annually in various places in the world. Each year a specific number of codes are given and in recent years these PAX codes have an expiration date which is generally the day following the conclusion of the event. PAX skins such as TF are being sold at high value on sites such as www.lolskins.com and www.ebay.com but the legitimacy of these I do not trust.. Although, for people that are collectors of rare content it may seem like a thing to buy, I strongly suggest it is not worth it. But that is for you to decide.

Kind Regards
lols =)
